result.execSummary:
Jerome Edward Devine III was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Jerome Edward Devine III was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jerome Edward Devine III

records.addlTxt: 2:31 PM  Defendant Jerome Edward Devine III in court, in custody.  Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. RL-clerk. Atty Burger indicated that attorney Sanders would be representing def in this matter. Def indicates he spoke with attorney Sanders earlier on this matter and requests to waive extradition. CT reviews warrants from Anoka County MN. Def is advised of rights. CT questions def. Recess. Attorney Derek Sanders in court for Jerome Edward Devine. Back on record 2:47 pm. Def requests to waive extradition. Def signs. CT signs. 2:50 pm adj.
Extradition hearing on May 23, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

EXTRADITION HEARING/INITIAL APPEARANCE: 1:37 PM Defendant Jerome Edward Devine III in court, in custody.  Attorney Donna Burger in court. Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. RL-clerk. CT reviews warrant out of Anoka County. ADA requests hearing be continued to another date. States def has a warrant out of St. Croix County as well. Atty Burger- states def is on cash bond on our case and likely will not post. Other open case is Br 2 file and is set for 6/2/22 at 8:45 am. Counsel requests this case be set for the same/date and time. CT- matter will be set for extradition hearing or review hearing with def's other file. 1:41 pm adj.
Extradition hearing scheduled for June 2, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Extradition hearing on June 2, 2022 at 08:45 am.
